mapper.select: SELECT A.HW_SEQ AS hwSeq, A.TITLE AS title, A.REG_DT AS regDt, CONCAT(B.FILE_PATH , B.FILE_NM) AS filePath, CONCAT(B.FILE_URL, B.FILE_NM ) AS fileUrl, CHECK_YN AS checkYn, REG_ID AS regId, DATE_FORMAT(reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS regDt FROM isaac_data.bcu_homework A, isaac_data.bcu_file B WHERE A.HW_SEQ = B.HW_SEQ AND REG_ID = #{regId} AND B.ORDER_NO = 1 ORDER BY A.HW_SEQ DESC

SELECT A.HW_SEQ AS hwSeq, A.TITLE AS title, A.REG_DT AS regDt, CONCAT(B.FILE_PATH , B.FILE_NM) AS filePath, CONCAT(B.FILE_URL, B.FILE_NM ) AS fileUrl, B.FILE_SEQ AS fileSeq, CHECK_YN AS checkYn, REG_ID AS regId, DATE_FORMAT(reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS regDt FROM isaac_data.bcu_homework A, isaac_data.bcu_file B WHERE A.HW_SEQ = B.HW_SEQ AND A.HW_SEQ = ${hwSeq} ORDER BY A.HW_SEQ DESC

SELECT A.HW_SEQ AS hwSeq, A.TITLE AS title, A.REPLY AS reply, A.REG_DT AS regDt, (SELECT TEACHER_YN FROM isaac_data.bcu_member WHERE USER_ID = A.REG_ID ) AS teacherYn, CONCAT(B.FILE_PATH , B.FILE_NM) AS filePath, CONCAT(B.FILE_URL, B.FILE_NM ) AS fileUrl, B.FILE_SEQ AS fileSeq, CHECK_YN AS checkYn, REG_ID AS regId, DATE_FORMAT(reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS regDt FROM isaac_data.bcu_homework A, isaac_data.bcu_file B WHERE A.HW_SEQ = ${hwSeq} AND B.FILE_SEQ = #{fileSeq} AND A.HW_SEQ = B.HW_SEQ
